Uses of Package
net.beadsproject.beads.core

Packages that use net.beadsproject.beads.core
net.beadsproject.beads.analysis Provides a set of classes for performing audio analysis on a stream of audio data. 
net.beadsproject.beads.analysis.featureextractors Provides a set of classes for performing feature extraction on audio data. 
net.beadsproject.beads.analysis.segmenters   
net.beadsproject.beads.core Provides Beads' core classes, in particular, Bead, UGen and AudioContext. 
net.beadsproject.beads.events Provides classes for handling events. 
net.beadsproject.beads.ugens Provides a set of useful UGens. 
 

Classes in net.beadsproject.beads.core used by net.beadsproject.beads.analysis
AudioContext
          AudioContext provides the core audio set up for running audio in a Beads project.
Bead
          Bead is an abstract class which defines basic behaviour such as starting and stopping, pausing and handling messages.
UGen
          A UGen is the main base class for implementing signal generation and processing units (unit generators).
 

Classes in net.beadsproject.beads.core used by net.beadsproject.beads.analysis.featureextractors
AudioContext
          AudioContext provides the core audio set up for running audio in a Beads project.

Classes in net.beadsproject.beads.core used by net.beadsproject.beads.core
AudioContext
          AudioContext provides the core audio set up for running audio in a Beads project.
Bead
          Bead is an abstract class which defines basic behaviour such as starting and stopping, pausing and handling messages.
BeadArray
          BeadArray represents an array of Beads (and is itself a subclass of Bead).
UGen
          A UGen is the main base class for implementing signal generation and processing units (unit generators).
